title: Server went down for update, while i was mid game
body:
for real we just started mid game, looked like a win, and then everything froze and it said "attempting to reconnect"
i have never randomly disconnected from a match, so i went a checked the server status, and its down.
dose this mean im getting a leaver buster????

replies.body: No. They had to shut down servers so that they could release the patch. You're fine.
dope! thanks, i was super scared of getting leaver buster for maintenance.
If you're disconnected for scheduled maintenance, the game will end in a draw and you don't receive Leaverbuster for the match.

There is scheduled patch maintenance being performed right now. It is announced ahead of time and can be viewed on the [Service Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) and on the notification on the top of your client and the website.
